tripleplay.util

Class Dragger

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.util.Dragger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer.Listener

    public abstract class Dragger
extends Object
implements Pointer.Listener
    A helpful class for implementing drag and drop behavior. Use in conjunction with an input region like so: 
    input.register(new SizedLayerRegion(layer) {
   public boolean hitTest (IPoint point) {
     return can_start_drag && super.hitTest(point);
   }
   // also override hasExpired if you desire custom expiry
 }, new Dragger() {
   public void onDragStart (IPoint start) {
     // ..drag bits..
   }
   // etc.
 });

             pythagoras.f.IPoint start)
        Called when a drag is in progress.
        Parameters:
        current - the current pointer position.
        start - the point at which the drag started.

      • onDragEnd

        public void onDragEnd(pythagoras.f.IPoint current,
             pythagoras.f.IPoint start)
        Called when the pointer was released during a drag.
        Parameters:
        current - the current (and final) pointer position.
        start - the point at which the drag started.
